rules_text:
Create a 1/1 black Zombie Cat creature token with “When this creature dies, target opponent discards a card.”
Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Target opponent gets an emblem with “At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you lose the game.”
special_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 black Zombie Cat creature token with “When this creature dies, target opponent discards a card.”
[-2]: Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
[-9]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you lose the game.”
